last_episode_to_air.name: Who’s the Queen?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bill gets ready to pop the question to Bri, but Kathleen fills his head with doubt; Erica must finally decide if she wants to go back to Rick; Desiry makes Rodney choose between her and his mother; Reese makes a grand gesture for Nonie.

name: Marrying Millions
overview: Follow six couples who are deeply in love and hoping to marry, but come from completely different worlds.  Regular people are whisked off their feet and plunged into a high-end life of riches, extravagant experiences, and glamorous trips around the globe.  On the road to the altar, the couples must try to bridge their vast differences and fit into each other's alien worlds.

episodes.name: Can't Buy My Love
episodes.overview: Brianna, 21, has a hard time fitting into 61-year old Bill's wealthy social circle; Katie dates one of her daughter's best friends; Rosie's parents are not supportive of her relationship with Drew; Brian is hesitant to mix with Gentille's friends.

episodes.name: Million Dollar Problems
episodes.overview: As Brianna tries to fit into Bill's world, Bill arranges for her to meet up with his ex-wife to get advice; Gentille decides it's time to see where Brian lives; Katie's daughter confronts her about dating Kolton.

episodes.name: My Secret Sugar Daddy
episodes.overview: Brianna confronts Bill about Kathleen’s accusations. Drew asks a big question that will change Rosie’s life. Brian meets Gentille’s friends for the first time, but it doesn’t go the way Gentille hopes. Hopelessly romantic Kate worries her rapper boyfriend, Shawn, isn’t ready to settle down and get married.

episodes.name: Royal Pains
episodes.overview: Rosie moves into Drew’s loft without the approval of her family. Katie meets Kolton’s parents for the first time. Sean finally tells his dad that he and Megan are getting married. Gentille throws a birthday party for herself.

episodes.name: No Pressure, No Diamond
episodes.overview: Bill makes a decision that will change his and Brianna’s life forever. Megan worries that Sean is having second thoughts about their wedding. Gentille and Brian spend some time alone to focus on their future. When Shawn flirts with fans after his big NYE performance, Kate gets worried. Rosie confronts Drew about his playboy past.

episodes.name: Marriage or Money?
episodes.overview: After Katie's breakup with Kolton, her daughter, Julia, plays matchmaker; Gentille questions whether to say "I do" or "I don't"; Bill plans a major surprise for Brianna; Sean's dad's disapproval jeopardizes Sean and Megan's wedding.

episodes.name: Steaks with Snakes
episodes.overview: After an eventful first year together, Brianna and Bill plan a big blowout in honor of Bri's 22nd birthday. They soon come to find that some of their culture clash issues from their first year are still alive and well. Brian and Gentille reconnect for the first time since their wedding day break-up. Business powerhouse Nonie confronts her skater boyfriend, Reese, about his refusal to meet her friends. Desiry questions the real reason why Rodney has kept their 2-year relationship a secret.

episodes.name: Rich Man, Poor Plan
episodes.overview: After Bri's mom causes a big blowout with Bill's ex-wife, Bri is left scrambling to mend the rift between the two families. Young and in love, 23-year-old Erica prepares for a showdown between her dad and her much older boyfriend, Rick. Reese faces his family's fury regarding the future of his relationship with Nonie. Multi-millionaire Kevin wants his unemployed girlfriend Kattie to split the dinner bill with him.

episodes.name: Daddy Issues
episodes.overview: Far from the beaches of Miami, Rick arrives in Springfield, Il, to pitch Erica's father on his relationship with Erica. Kattie is hard up for rent and approaches Kevin for a loan, but he won't be anyone's bank. Donovan must manage Dani's desire for a ring while coming to terms with his feelings about marriage. Newly single, Gentille's "ladies' night" turns wild with shots and a new hot prospect.

episodes.name: I Can't Get No Satisfaction
episodes.overview: Still wanting to merge their worlds together, Bill organizes a dinner for Bri's mom, Sharon, and his ex-wife Kathleen to resolve tensions, but soon he becomes the target. After getting an ultimatum from Desiry, Rodney comes clean to his mom about their relationship. Strapped for cash, Reese considers a new way to make a quick buck that has Nonie rethinking their future. Gentille buys her dream house. Dani and Don's personal and professional life balance finally comes to a head.

episodes.name: Mother's Point of View
episodes.overview: Bill is in the dog house after a disastrous dinner with Bri's parents, so to make things right he surprises Bri with a magical trip to reconnect. After finally introducing Desiry to his parents, Rodney is hoping to hear approval from his mom--instead he gets an earful. Completely fed up with Don, Dani is taking her future into her own hands. Disturbed about her growing rift with Reese's family, Nonie makes a last ditch effort to win them over.

episodes.name: An Indecent Proposal
episodes.overview: After a rocky dinner with Reese's family, Nonie makes a big decision about their relationship. Things don't go according to plan when Kattie sets up a double date with Kevin and her best friend Natalie. Rick tells his friends about his plans to propose to Erica. Bill's biggest fear comes true when Sharon moves in with him and Bri.

episodes.name: Rough Waters Ahead
episodes.overview: Bill tries to adjust to Bri's mother Sharon moving into the house, but things quickly go south, leaving Bri torn between Bill and her family. Desiry's world is turned upside down after Rodney reveals a devastating secret that he's been keeping from her. Erica tells her family about her engagement to Rick, but their response causes serious waves. After a tense argument with Dani, Donovan warms to the idea of proposing. Kevin drops a bomb on Kattie.

episodes.name: Love On the Rocks
episodes.overview: After telling Desiry about his infidelity, Rodney has to pull off an all or nothing plan in hopes of winning Desiry’s hand. Rick travels to Illinois to beg forgiveness after proposing to Erica and neglecting to ask her father first. Long distance is pulling Kevin and Kattie apart, but Kattie has an idea that may close the gap between them and keep their love alive. Things are feeling crowded in Bill’s mansion with Bri’s mother roaming the halls. Bri needs to find a way to keep both sides of her life happy before everything implodes.

episodes.name: Put a Ring (Back) On It
episodes.overview: Rodney’s proposal could go either way since Desiry might not forgive him for his past betrayal. Bri realizes their 12,000 square foot mansion isn’t enough to separate the tension between her mom and Bill. Reese has to choose between his mother’s wishes and his one true love. Rick returns from Springfield, hoping Erica will put her engagement ring back on. Donovan and Dani visit Dani’s father, which could either bring them closer to the altar or farther away from each other.

episodes.name: Marriage Material
episodes.overview: At their engagement party, Rodney faces the heat head on when Desiry's friend confronts him about his infidelity.

episodes.name: Fear and Lambos in Las Vegas
episodes.overview: After getting serious shade from Desiry's friend at their engagement party, Rodney puts his foot down, but Desiry isn't here for it.

episodes.name: Mothers Know Best?
episodes.overview: Nervous about their reaction, Rodney breaks the news of his engagement to his parents.

episodes.name: Save the Date
episodes.overview: Erica and Rick land back in Springfield for their "Wedding Weekend", but Erica's dad may have other plans in mind.

episodes.name: Engagements and Ultimatums
episodes.overview: With no word from her father the day before the wedding, Erica and Rick move forward with their rehearsal dinner in hopes he'll reconsider.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Nonie and Reese settle into their extravagant California getaway, while Reese enjoys the surroundings, Nonie has much bigger plans in her back pocket. Bri approaches Bill about their parenting plans, her desires for their future, and a very personal trip to the doctor. With his relationship struggling, Kevin looks for some sound advice from his mom. Rick and Erica’s wedding day is finally upon them but will everyone be onboard?

episodes.name: Cracks in the Commitment
episodes.overview: Reese makes a new plan after Nonie’s surprise proposal; Rodney is unsure about his next move; Dani makes a big decision; Kathleen questions Bri’s motives; Bill shares his fertility news.

episodes.name: Rodney, It's Your Mama
episodes.overview: After kicking Kevin to the curb, Kattie has her eyes set on a new kind of love. Erica decides to stay in Springfield to reconnect with family while Rick parties back in Miami. After another encounter with Bill’s ex-wife Kathleen, Bri let’s Bill know that she’s been pushed to the edge. Nonie tries to reconnect with old friends in hopes of starting over. With their engagement on the rocks, Rodney and Desiry arrive at couple’s counseling in hopes of revealing all of Rodney’s secrets.

episodes.name: Island Time
episodes.overview: While trying to clear the air with his mother, Desiry discovers Rodney has another secret. Rick and Erica finally speak for the first time since she called off the wedding. Nonie suggests long term career goals for Reese, but he's not so sure about the idea. Don flies Dani to paradise with romantic plans for their time in the sun, but Dani's concerns about the prenup could derail his big surprise.

episodes.name: Who’s the Queen?
episodes.overview: Bill gets ready to pop the question to Bri, but Kathleen fills his head with doubt; Erica must finally decide if she wants to go back to Rick; Desiry makes Rodney choose between her and his mother; Reese makes a grand gesture for Nonie.
